Master Subclassing / Dual Class Rean:

For the forces of the gods must be certified by a change in profession. The certificate was issued to replace the profession heroes long before the fall of Shilen. It is unfortunate, but now it is no longer obtain.
But if you still get a certificate for a change in profession, come to the state Division for the forces of the gods.
dual class can not get the power of the gods and change the class.
